title: ðŸ“¬ Mailbag Monday: Coaches on the hot seat plus projecting future Hall of Famers (Football 7/13)
description:
A Monday episode means it's time to empty out the mailbag. Will Brinson, Ryan Wilson and John Breech answer questions from listeners including how the Chiefs will still be able to build around Patrick Mahomes' massive extension and which coaches could get fired first. Which players that have played three seasons or fewer have the greatest chance to make the Hall of Fame? The guys run through the possibilities. Could every team in the NFC West reach the postseason in 2020? Finally, some fantasy talk to end the pod.
Nominate Pick Six for The People's Choice Podcast Awards: podcastawards.com/app/signup/
